mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.use_date AS "useDate", a.use_flag AS "useFlag", a.num AS "num", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.project AS "project", a.instructions AS "instructions", a.state AS "state", a.reagent_id AS "reagent.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u4.name AS "user.name", u4.office_id AS "user.office_id", b.name AS "reagent.name", c.name AS "user.office.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_reagent_record( id, use_date, use_flag, num, user_id, project, instructions, state, reagent_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{useDate}, #{useFlag}, #{num}, #{user.id}, #{project}, #{instructions}, #{state}, #{reagent.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE work_reagent_record SET use_date = #{useDate}, use_flag = #{useFlag}, user_id = #{user.id}, project = #{project}, instructions = #{instructions}, state = #{state}, reagent_id = #{reagent.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
